query: Send a natural language message through the full 7-stage pipeline and verify it reaches the agent
expected_behavior: All 7 pipeline stages execute in order: ingestion → authorization → debouncing → session resolution → command detection → agent dispatch → block streaming
Stage timing is logged for each stage with name and duration in milliseconds
The message is not incorrectly matched as a slash command at stage 5
The agent loop runs and produces a response
The response is delivered back to the source channel via block streaming (stage 7)
